Text.Page:
What was the Valkyon Federation doing when this place was taken over by the argons?

What's the matter? Has the cat got your tongue?
You're different from the other federation soldiers. We need you to help us perform our duty.

Thanks to you, everything is going well. I really can't thank you enough.

God bless you. I think I can finally trust the Valkyon Federation.

Thanks to you, everything is going well. I really can't thank you enough.

God bless you. I think I can finally trust the Valkyon Federation.
